'''Jade Fragment (Right)''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained within [[Carp's Rest]]. Bringing it, along with [[Jade Fragment (Left)]] to the Ancient Jade Pendant in [[Chizhang Wall]] for the achievement [[A Ruined Tale]], along with the final mural for [[The Mural Veil]].
